name: @scramjet/framework
description: Simple yet powerful live data computation framework.

scripts.build: rm -rf ./build && npm run copy && tsc -p tsconfig.build.json
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run test:run:unit && npm run test:run:bdd
scripts.test:unit: npm run build && npm run test:run:unit
scripts.test:unit:d: npm run build && npm run test:run:unit -- debug --break
scripts.test:bdd: npm run build && npm run test:run:bdd
scripts.dist: rm -rf ./dist && tsc && node scripts/prepare-readme.js && node scripts/prepare-package.js
scripts.coverage: npm run coverage:generate && npx http-server coverage
scripts.coverage:generate: npm run build && npm run coverage:ignore && npm run coverage:unit && npm run coverage:bdd && npm run coverage:report
scripts.coverage:check: npm run build && npm run coverage:ignore && npm run coverage:unit && npm run coverage:bdd && nyc report --check-coverage
scripts.coverage:unit: nyc --silent npm run test:run:unit && SCRAMJET_LOG=1 nyc --silent --no-clean npm run test:run:unit -- -m "trace does not throw"
scripts.copy: copyfiles -f test/bdd/features/*.feature build/test/bdd/features && copyfiles -f test/_assets/* build/test/_assets

author: Scramjet <open-source@scramjet.org>
